changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `germplasm_study_source` ( `germplasm_study_source_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gid` INT NOT NULL, `project_id` INT NOT NULL, `nd_experiment_id` INT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`germplasm_study_source_id`), INDEX `asdasd_idx` (`project_id` ASC), INDEX `FK_nd_experiment_id_idx` (`nd_experiment_id` ASC), CONSTRAINT `FK_project_id_1` FOREIGN KEY (`project_id`) REFERENCES `project` (`project_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `FK_nd_experiment_id_1` FOREIGN KEY (`nd_experiment_id`) REFERENCES `nd_experiment` (`nd_experiment_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION);

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM listnms lnms INNER JOIN listdata_project ldp ON ldp.list_id = lnms.listid WHERE lnms.listtype IN ( 'ADVANCED', 'IMP_CROSS', 'CRT_CROSS' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM germplasm_study_source gss where gss.project_id = lnms.projectid and gss.gid = ldp.germplasm_id);

changeSet.comment: Migrate existing advance and cross list to germplasm_study_source.
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO germplasm_study_source(`gid`,`project_id`,`nd_experiment_id`,`type`) SELECT DISTINCT ldp.germplasm_id, lnms.projectid, NULL, CASE WHEN lnms.listtype IN ( 'IMP_CROSS', 'CRT_CROSS' ) THEN 'CROSS' ELSE 'ADVANCE' END FROM listnms lnms INNER JOIN listdata_project ldp ON lnms.listid = ldp.list_id WHERE lnms.listtype IN ( 'ADVANCED', 'IMP_CROSS', 'CRT_CROSS' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM germplasm_study_source gss where gss.project_id = lnms.projectid and gss.gid = ldp.germplasm_id);
-- Link ims_stock_transaction to germplasm_study_source UPDATE ims_stock_transaction ist INNER JOIN listdata_project ldp ON ist.listdata_project_id = ldp.listdata_project_id INNER JOIN germplasm_study_source gss ON ldp.germplasm_id = gss.gid SET ist.germplasm_study_source_id = gss.germplasm_study_source_id;
